inspirations / why you were drawn to make this game:
I was inspired by a couple of shows that were airing on YouTube at the moment.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a1Y1ocyudjs / living through depression, Julia's story. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WWloIAQpMcQ/ how to cope with anxiety, Olivia Remmes. 
These types of content inspired me to create something that talks about these deep subjects, such as depression and anxiety. I figured out the best way to express these emotions in a game would be a narrative type base of game.
I created a main character that struggles through depression and anxiety. The main character has to battle through such hardship by himself. 
Later during the development I created a counterpart for my MC, "the voices".
This character plays an important role as it allows the users to feel more in touch with the MC, and allowing users to immerse more into the psyche of the character.
